nodes.text: Inivon was a male Human Sergeant of the House Organa of Alderaan living during the Cold War. During the Alderaan Civil War in 3643 BBY he served under Lieutenant Dargus and was along with the rest of his men holding the House Ulgo forces at the Dassel Pass. General Gesselle Organa send them reinforcements in form of a Sith Lord, who agreed to help them in exchange for information. Inivon did not trusted the Sith and attempted to leave with his men.

Sergeant Inivon appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Warrior class mission on Alderaan if the player makes the light side choice in conversation with Gesselle Organa. He is voiced by Troy Hall.
